msbt.message: Hey, I hear you. We're still groovy, and the anniversary shoot's gonna happen. I'm just, like, behind a little.
Hmmm Well, OK, butwhat'll we do about the lovely sets? Prepping them ourselves could get a bit ticklish
Hey there! Thanks for coming. So I need to borrow you for a minute.
Hey there. You got some good timing, you know that? Can I, like, borrow you for a minute?
OK, so this here is Reese
and her main squeeze, Cyrus.

They're married and in love, um a whole bunch. Far out, right?Anyway, they wanna get some anniversary photos made. Fancy ones. With sets and stuff.And 'cause it's June now, and June is wedding season, uhhere they are!<10_4 /> June is a whole season now! Whoa!

Thing is, I'm cool with lending out my studio, but my wedding sets are running sliiiiiightly behind schedule.I'd ordered decorations and painted the walls and floor, but then a neat bird flew by and there wentMay.Long story, uhlong, someone's still gotta move stuff around so it looks wedding-y, then snap some photos.So, think I could ask you to be that someone? You'd really be helping this shutterdog out.
Sounds fun!
Uh, sure, I guess.
Really?! Wow, you are solid on down. Come on, let's go!
This is my wedding-picture studio.<10_4 /> It's, uhactually my kitchen with some set walls I put up. Let me know if you get hungry.

Since it's your first time in one of my studios, let me give you the rundown real quick.You can press  to change the decor in a studio, just like you do at home.Oh, and speaking of set decorations, I've got a special deal going with Nook Shopping So if it's in your catalog, you can just borrow one on the spot to use in your set! Sweet like granola, right?
It works pretty much exactly like my regular, not-my-kitchen studios.But if you forgot how THOSE work, which'll happen sometimes, just come find me outside.

Oh! One thing. If you gotta take five partway through, no prob. But talk to me before you go back in, OK?Otherwise, Reese is in charge, so if you wanna know what to do, she's your alpaca. Cool? <10_4 />Cool. I owe you!
Hey, it's ! Good to see you.
So, uhgonna do more anniversary photos with Reese and Cyrus? Or do you got a question about the studio?
Anniversary photos!
About the studio...
Never mind!
Right on! Give me half a sec to get my kitch— I mean, my wedding set ready. Hold tight.
Oh? Lay it on me.
Tell me about sets!
There are models?
Wardrobe?
How do I take pictures?
I'm good!
Got it. I'm great at not mindin'. Like, if you wanna use the studio for yourself, I don't mind at all!Just let me know if you wanna help Reese and Cyrus with those anniversary photos, alright?
Heard you got some real groovy shots in there. Good work!
I'm still gonna need help tomorrow if you're interested. It'd really help me out. Think about it, OK?
Guess that's gonna put a wrap on June. Those two lovebirds are flyin' home tomorrow.I'm gonna miss having 'em around. All that positive energy of theirs just lights up the whole island.
Whoa! That party looked outasight!<10_4 /> Almost makes it worth giving up my kitchen for this. But I miss my fridge.I knew I could count on you. You're, like, the best, !
Hey! Looks like you've got this set-building thing down!
You really are the best. I gotta think of a way to repay you
Oh, hey! Yeah! Here, you can have this neat card I got. I think it's got a wedding fencing DIY recipe on it.
Oh, hey! Yeah! Here, you can have Wait, that's not right. You can't have. You need pocket space to have.Go empty your pockets a little so you can start, like, having again. I'll chill here.
Hey, you get that pocket thing all sorted? Cool deal. Here, have this wedding fencing DIY recipe.

I was gonna have everything ready for the anniversary shoot before they got here, but, just Time, you know?Well, you've got a good eye for this, so just keep on keepin' on and everything's gonna be fine.

Huh? Wait an all-natural second. You DO know what DIY is, right? It's, like, making things.OK, I know that sounds complicated, but word is that Tom Nook's been offerin' a workshop on DIY basics.You probably oughta wander over to Resident Services for the skinny after you get back to .Actuallymaybe I should go too. You can never know too much stuff about stuff!
So, hey, you wanna do anniversary photos with Reese and Cyrus? Or do you have a Photopia question? Or
Anniversary photos!
About the studio...
Never mind!
Hey, ! You really saved my quinoa on the wedding shoot last month.
Reese and Cyrus were over the moon with all the photos they got. That was all you, buddy. All you!
Reese and Cyrus were real stoked about the photos. I owe you one.
Hey, ! Wedding season's a wrap, so Reese and Cyrus took off.
Always nice to see a couple in love, you know? Real inspiring Yeah. I hope they stay happy forever.
